summary.span: 对统一资源标识符 (URI) 发出请求。

span.span: Makes a request to a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI).

summary.span: 这是一个 类。

span.span: This is an class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是`abstract`基类。NET 的请求/响应模型，用于从 Internet 中访问数据。 is the `abstract` base class for .NET's request/response model for accessing data from the Internet. 使用请求/响应模型的应用程序可以以协议不可知的方式，在其中应用程序处理的实例从 Internet 请求数据类时特定于协议的子代类执行的详细信息请求。An application that uses the request/response model can request data from the Internet in a protocol-agnostic manner, in which the application works with instances of the class while protocol-specific descendant classes carry out the details of the request. 从为特定的 URI，例如 Web 页的服务器上的应用程序发送请求。Requests are sent from an application to a particular URI, such as a Web page on a server. URI 确定要从列表中创建的正确子代类后代注册应用程序。The URI determines the proper descendant class to create from a list of descendants registered for the application. 后代通常注册用于处理特定的协议，如 HTTP 或 FTP，但可以注册用于处理请求的特定服务器或服务器上的路径。 descendants are typically registered to handle a specific protocol, such as HTTP or FTP, but can be registered to handle a request to a specific server or path on a server. 类将引发中发生错误时访问 Internet 资源时。The class throws a when errors occur while accessing an Internet resource. 属性是一个值，该值指示错误的来源。The property is one of the values that indicates the source of the error. 当是、属性包含收到来自 Internet 资源。When is , the property contains the received from the Internet resource. 因为类是`abstract`类的实际行为实例在运行时由子类由方法。Because the class is an `abstract` class, the actual behavior of instances at run time is determined by the descendant class returned by method. 默认值和异常有关的详细信息，请参阅文档对于子代类中，如和。For more information about default values and exceptions, see the documentation for the descendant classes, such as and . > [!NOTE] > 使用方法初始化新实例。Use the method to initialize new instances. 不要使用构造函数。Do not use the constructor. > [!NOTE] > 与普通用户的凭据运行的应用程序创建 WebRequest 对象，如果应用程序将无法访问证书安装在本地计算机存储区中，除非权限已显式提供给用户若要这样做。If the application that creates the WebRequest object runs with the credentials of a Normal user, the application will not be able to access certificates installed in the local machine store unless permission has been explicitly given to the user to do so. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建实例，并返回该响应。The following example shows how to create a instance and return the response. summary.span: 获取或设置此请求的缓存策略。

span.span: Gets or sets the cache policy for this request.

value.span: 定义缓存策略的 对象。

span.span: A object that defines a cache policy.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当前的缓存策略和缓存中请求的资源存在确定是否可以从缓存检索的响应。The current cache policy and the presence of the requested resource in the cache determine whether a response can be retrieved from the cache. 通常使用缓存的响应可提高应用程序性能，但没有中缓存的响应与服务器上的响应不匹配的风险。Using cached responses usually improves application performance, but there is a risk that the response in the cache does not match the response on the server. 可以指定默认缓存策略，Machine.config 配置文件中或通过设置使用超文本传输协议 (HTTP) 或安全超文本传输协议 (HTTPS) 的 URI 方案的请求的属性。Default cache policy can be specified in the Machine.config configuration file or by setting the property for requests that use the Hypertext Transfer Protocol (HTTP) or Secure Hypertext Transfer Protocol (HTTPS) URI scheme. 如果资源的响应流是检索，并且读取到流末尾，资源的副本是仅添加到缓存。A copy of a resource is only added to the cache if the response stream for the resource is retrieved and read to the end of the stream. 因此相同的资源的另一个请求可以使用缓存的副本，具体取决于此请求的缓存策略级别。So another request for the same resource could use a cached copy, depending on the cache policy level for this request. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置 Web 请求的缓存策略。The following code example demonstrates setting the cache policy for a Web request. [!code-cpp[NCLSimpleCache#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLSimpleCache/CPP/NCLSimpleCache.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[NCLSimpleCache#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLSimpleCache/CS/example.cs#2)]

summary.span: 当在子类中重写时，获取从 类派生的工厂对象，该类用于创建为生成对指定 URI 的请求而实例化的 。

span.span: When overridden in a descendant class, gets the factory object derived from the class used to create the instantiated for making the request to the specified URI.

value.span: 由 方法返回的派生 类型。

span.span: The derived type returned by the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性允许应用程序来确定哪些派生的工厂对象用于创建请求。This property allows an application to determine which derived factory object was used to create the request. 此对象可能[System.Net.Browser.WebRequestCreator.BrowserHttp](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/system.net.browser.webrequestcreator.browserhttp(v=vs.95))或[System.Net.Browser.WebRequestCreator.ClientHttp](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/system.net.browser.webrequestcreator.clienthttp(v=vs.95))，但它也可能是派生自的自定义实例。This object may be [System.Net.Browser.WebRequestCreator.BrowserHttp](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/system.net.browser.webrequestcreator.browserhttp(v=vs.95)) or [System.Net.Browser.WebRequestCreator.ClientHttp](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/system.net.browser.webrequestcreator.clienthttp(v=vs.95)), but it may also be a custom instance derived from . 这允许应用程序以确定是否浏览器承载[!INCLUDE[silverlight](~/includes/silverlight-md.md)]、[!INCLUDE[silverlight](~/includes/silverlight-md.md)]客户端或某些自定义对象处理 HTTP 请求和响应实例。This allows an application to determine whether the browser hosting [!INCLUDE[silverlight](~/includes/silverlight-md.md)], the [!INCLUDE[silverlight](~/includes/silverlight-md.md)] client, or some custom object handles HTTP requests and responses for the instance. 方法允许应用程序配置后者派生到特定 URI 发出请求时，类型将被实例化。The method allows an application to configure which derived type will be instantiated when making a request to a specific URI. 创建者通常注册用于处理特定的协议，此类的 HTTP 或 HTTPS，但可以注册用于处理请求的特定服务器或服务器上的路径。 creators are typically registered to handle a specific protocol, such HTTP or HTTPS, but can be registered to handle a request to a specific server or path on a server. 这是有用的当多个派生时类型可以处理相同的协议的请求。This is useful when more than one derived type can process requests for the same protocol. [!INCLUDE[sil3_first](~/includes/sil3-first-md.md)]和更高版本的运行时支持多个 HTTP 处理程序每个都具有不同的功能。The [!INCLUDE[sil3_first](~/includes/sil3-first-md.md)] and later runtime supports multiple HTTP handlers each having different capabilities. 例如，可能需要使用具象状态传输 (REST) 的 web 服务[System.Net.Browser.WebRequestCreator.ClientHttp](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/system.net.browser.webrequestcreator.clienthttp(v=vs.95))而 SOAP web 服务可能能够使用默认值的处理程序[System.Net.Browser.WebRequestCreator.BrowserHttp](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/system.net.browser.webrequestcreator.browserhttp(v=vs.95))处理程序。For example, a web service that uses Representational State Transfer (REST) might require the [System.Net.Browser.WebRequestCreator.ClientHttp](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/system.net.browser.webrequestcreator.clienthttp(v=vs.95)) handler while a SOAP web service might be able to use the default [System.Net.Browser.WebRequestCreator.BrowserHttp](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/system.net.browser.webrequestcreator.browserhttp(v=vs.95)) handler.

summary.span: 获取或设置此请求的默认缓存策略。

span.span: Gets or sets the default cache policy for this request.

value.span: 一个 ，它指定当没有其他策略适用时对此请求有效的缓存策略。

span.span: A that specifies the cache policy in effect for this request when no other policy is applicable.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此策略适用于此请求，如果满足下列条件：This policy is used for this request if the following conditions exist: - 没有任何为此请求指定的属性。There is no property specified for this request. - 不适用到统一资源标识符 (URI) 的缓存策略用于创建此请求指定文件的计算机和应用程序配置。The machine and application configuration files do not specify a cache policy that is applicable to the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) used to create this request. 缓存策略将确定是否可以从缓存而不是将请求发送到的资源主机计算机获取请求的资源。The cache policy determines whether the requested resource can be taken from a cache instead of sending the request to the resource host computer. 如果资源的响应流是检索，并且读取到流末尾，资源的副本是仅添加到缓存。A copy of a resource is only added to the cache if the response stream for the resource is retrieved and read to the end of the stream. 因此相同的资源的另一个请求可以使用缓存的副本，具体取决于此请求的缓存策略级别。So another request for the same resource could use a cached copy, depending on the cache policy level for this request. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置 Web 请求的默认缓存策略。The following code example demonstrates setting the default cache policy for Web requests. [!code-cpp[NCLSimpleCache#15](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLSimpleCache/CPP/NCLSimpleCache.cpp#15)] [!code-csharp[NCLSimpleCache#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLSimpleCache/CS/example.cs#15)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性获取或设置全局代理。The property gets or sets the global proxy. 属性确定的默认代理的所有如果请求支持的代理并使用显式设置任何代理，请使用实例属性。The property determines the default proxy that all instances use if the request supports proxies and no proxy is set explicitly using the property. 当前支持代理和。Proxies are currently supported by and . 属性从 app.config 文件中读取代理设置。The property reads proxy settings from the app.config file. 如果没有配置文件，将使用当前用户的 Internet Explorer (IE) 代理设置。If there is no config file, the current user's Internet Explorer (IE) proxy settings are used. 如果属性设置为 null，则所有后续的实例类创建的或方法不会代理。If the property is set to null, all subsequent instances of the class created by the or methods do not have a proxy.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将此属性设置为`true`时发出的此请求对象，如果请求服务器进行身份验证应使用当前登录用户的凭据。Set this property to `true` when requests made by this object should, if requested by the server, be authenticated using the credentials of the currently logged on user. 对于客户端应用程序，这是在大多数情况下所需的行为。For client applications, this is the desired behavior in most scenarios. 对于中间层应用程序，例如 ASP.NET 应用程序，而不是使用此属性，通常会设置到客户端的名义发出的请求的凭据的属性。For middle tier applications, such as ASP.NET applications, instead of using this property, you would typically set the property to the credentials of the client on whose behalf the request is made.
